alert.note: Alert for Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 08 at 3:26AM EDT until May 08 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...CRITICALLY LOW HUMIDITY WITH GUSTY WINDS AND HIGH ERC WILL RESULT IN ELEVATED FIRE DANGER TODAY... .Drier air is filling into the state today under breezy west winds, causing marginally low relative humidities over the interior. Combined with low fuel moisture, this will cause Red Flag conditions in parts of Polk and Highlands counties. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL FLORIDA... The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Area - Ruskin FL has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 2 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Polk...Highlands. * WIND...West winds around 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...30-35 percent. * ERC...31-32. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
